column5: So on Friday i got text form a friend down the street says bring family to the fish ladder. I gathered them up and took them . We watched as they moved about ten nice trout.  yesterday I get text come to ladder there is lots today . I go and watch as they lift 32 they have said over 200 so far and are waiting for it to rain as the ladder will fill usally over 100 a day   here is some vid from the ladder really it's my first time doing the vid thing so it is what it is
Let's hope all those fish do their thing and get back to the lake before the spring slaughter.
